description:
www.angular-up.com
Brought to you by 500Tech and the community
@AngularUP

Across the universe - Server side rendering with Angular Universal - Nir Kaufman

Angular 2 is designed to be agnostic about the runtime environment. This means that the same application can be deployed to different environments like browsers, servers or even native devices.

In this talk we will learn how to leverage this power using Angular Universal, and deploy our front-end SPA on the server without modification.
We will also learn how to avoid accessing environment specific functions, like direct DOM access, etc.
title: Nir Kaufman - Server Side Rendering with Angular Universal
